        Constructs a dataset given a folder by adding all images in that folder. It accepts all images of the given filetype whose size is (length x width)

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(java.lang.String folder)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a dataset given a folder. It reads all "png" images in that folder with the specific image dimensions of (1280x1024)
        Parameters:
        folder -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
